SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.engine.logic

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.engine.logic.GameState
public final class GameState extends Object
Manages the current state of the game. Tracks input states, window handle, and the currently loaded scene.

    • setScene

      public static void setScene(BaseScene scene)

      Parameters:

    • getScene
